import React, { Component } from 'react' import {BrowserRouter, Route, Link} from 'react-router-dom' import data from '../data' function ProductPage (props) { // console.log(props.location.state) const product = props.location.state const addToOrder = () => { fetch("http://localhost:3001/orders/1/order_products", { method: "POST", headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' } }) } return (
Home

  • {product.name}

  • {product.price}
    • Description:

    {product.description}
) } export default ProductPage;
